Car collides with property in Fairview Heights, Auckland; wedged between house and retaining wall https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-collides-with-property-in-fairview-heights-auckland-wedge- Between-house-and-retaining-wall/T5PGPJW34ZDEHMCQP6N2EUFSMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/car-collides-with-property-in-fairview-heights-auckland-wedge- Between-house-and-retaining-wall/T5PGPJW34ZDEHMCQP6N2EUFSMY/ Police said a crane may be needed to remove the car from where it is. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 09:59:21 +0000 Emergency services are responding to an address in Auckland’s Fairview Heights where a car has collided with a house and is suspended precariously over a 3m drop. Photo / Hayden Woodward
Riverton boat tragedy: Coastguard volunteer says survivor plucked from capsized boat, deceased trapped under vessel https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/riverton-boat-tragedy-coastguard-volunteer-says-survivor-plucked-from-capsized-boat-deceased-trapped-under-vessel/MKWODEGXGZB4PAYVJX6VMT4OPE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/riverton-boat-tragedy-coastguard-volunteer-says-survivor-plucked-from-capsized-boat-deceased-trapped-under-vessel/MKWODEGXGZB4PAYVJX6VMT4OPE/ Benjamin PlummerCoastguard volunteers were on the scene within five minutes of a mayday call. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 07:56:45 +0000 A Coastguard volunteer who responded after a boat capsized on the Riverton bar in Southland says it was “the worst accident” he has ever come across on the bar. Photo / NZH
Staff member assaulted in armed robbery in Waipapa, Northland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/staff-member-assaulted-in-armed-robbery-in-waipapa-northland/KMMVRFUFGZBYFLPI5WXFN6CHO4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/staff-member-assaulted-in-armed-robbery-in-waipapa-northland/KMMVRFUFGZBYFLPI5WXFN6CHO4/ Paramedics checked the staff member at the scene, who was not seriously injured. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 07:26:11 +0000 Police were called to the incident, which happened about 1pm.
Christchurch ice skating tragedy: Alpine Ice brings in mandatory helmet policy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-ice-skating-tragedy-alpine-ice-brings-in-mandatory-helmet-policy/6TPTJREXEVE3PK6EHS7YVIKBGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-ice-skating-tragedy-alpine-ice-brings-in-mandatory-helmet-policy/6TPTJREXEVE3PK6EHS7YVIKBGI/ The teenager suffered an 'unsurvivable' head injury while on a school trip. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 06:37:14 +0000 Kymani Hiley-Hetaraka died in Christchurch hospital on Thursday, August 1, following an ice skating accident.
Opinion: Christopher Luxon will be hoping his maths fix will save future headaches – Claire Trevett https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-will-be-hoping-his-maths-fix-will-save-future-headaches-claire-trevett/OIZWMKQ5ZNBMFP3NWWTSYJEB2M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-will-be-hoping-his-maths-fix-will-save-future-headaches-claire-trevett/OIZWMKQ5ZNBMFP3NWWTSYJEB2M/ Claire TrevettOPINION: It won't have hurt that Luxon's rush job on maths shows him as an Action Man. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 06:21:35 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon (left) and Education Minister Erica Stanford speak to media about the new education move. Photo / Claire Trevett
Meth psychosis: Ethan Simon jailed for stabbing Burger King workers in South Auckland without provocation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ethan-simon-jailed-for-stabbing-two-teen-workers-without-pro Vocation-at-south-auckland-burger-king/PPEKFT4CCJGR5ENJN2XENZDSOE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/ethan-simon-jailed-for-stabbing-two-teen-workers-without-pro Vocation-at-south-auckland-burger-king/PPEKFT4CCJGR5ENJN2XENZDSOE/ Craig KapitanEthan Simon said he was especially sad about his victims' ages after learning what he did. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Two youths were stabbed while working at Burger King last year. Ethan Simon has been sentenced for the attacks, which his lawyer says occurred while he was suffering methamphetamine-induced psychosis.
Security guard assaulted in foiled jewellery store aggravated robbery in Mt Roskill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-guard-assaulted-in-foiled-jewellery-store-aggravated-robbery-in-mt-roskill/RAZBUT5FT5AFZI2MJ24LDAIQ6M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/security-guard-assaulted-in-foiled-jewellery-store-aggravated-robbery-in-mt-roskill/RAZBUT5FT5AFZI2MJ24LDAIQ6M/ Police are still hunting the armed offenders after they fled the scene. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 05:53:13 +0000 A security guard is struck in the head with a hammer during an aggravated robbery at Sonia Sansaar jewellery shop in the Tulja Centre, Stoddard Rd, Mr Roskill. Photo / Supplied
Found dead on Dargaville beach: Jo Sione-Lauaki renowned for her ‘Mamatanga’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/found-dead-on-dargaville-beach-jo-sione-lauaki-renowned-for-her-mamatanga/AJMXYBAYHJCGHKMTCBLZDPTTBA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/found-dead-on-dargaville-beach-jo-sione-lauaki-renowned-for-her-mamatanga/AJMXYBAYHJCGHKMTCBLZDPTTBA/ Grieving whānau expect 600 people for Dargaville mum Jo Sione-Lauaki's tangi. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 05:17:20 +0000 Jo Sione-Lauaki (left) and Jared Sione-Lauaki (right). Jo was found dead on Omamari Beach in Northland on August 2 in circumstances police have described as "unexplained". Photo / Supplied
Labour MP Kieran McAnulty emphatically denies leadership ambitions, says media must ‘accept that’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/labour-mp-kieran-mcanulty-emphatically-denies-leadership-ambitions-says-media-must-accept-that/IZDFJBOL3RA3FJO5CS6JEMENSI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/labour-mp-kieran-mcanulty-emphatically-denies-leadership-ambitions-says-media-must-accept-that/IZDFJBOL3RA3FJO5CS6JEMENSI/ Senior Labour MP insists he does not want to be the leader even if Hipkins stood down. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 05:01:53 +0000 Former Local Government Minister Kieran McAnulty told Q+A speculation about a Labour leadership change was "not helpful". Photo / TVNZ
Person arrested after driving on wrong side of Waikato Expressway, causing three-vehicle crash then fleeing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-arrested-after-driven-on-wrong-side-of-waikato-expressway-causing- Three-vehicle-crash-then-fleeing/YNGEXJHA3NHTDIJLA3GPNMHX6E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-arrested-after-driven-on-wrong-side-of-waikato-expressway-causing- Three-vehicle-crash-then-fleeing/YNGEXJHA3NHTDIJLA3GPNMHX6E/ After causing the accident, the driver pulled an about-turn then fled the scene. Sun, 04 Aug 2024 04:39:52 +0000 A person has been arrested after driving on the wrong side of the Waikato Expressway (SH1), causing a three-vehicle crash and fleeing the scene.
